Subject: Badminton
data: 1 Which badminton player won the Indian Open Grand Prix Gold championship in 2014? A Misha Zilberman B Xue Song C Kashyap Parupalli D Brice Leverdez Answer: Option [B]
2 In which stadium India Open Grand Prix Gold tournament held? A Babu Banarasi Das Indoor Stadium B Rajib Gandhi Indoor Stadium C Sports Authority of India Complex D None of these Answer: Option [A]
3 Which player won the women’s singles title at India Open Super Series Badminton tournament 2015? A Saina Nehwal B Jwala Gutta C Yihan Wang D None of these Answer: Option [A]
4 Who won India's first Olympic Medal in badminton? A Prakash Padukone B P Gopichand C Saina Nehwal D Kidambi Srikanth Answer: Option [C]
5 Who is the youngest badminton player to represent India at championships? A Vaishnavi Reddy B Gayatri Gopichand C Radhika Menon D Jwala Gutta Answer: Option [B]
6 Who became the first Indian to win the All England Open Championship in 1980? A Prakash Padukone B Chetan Anand C Rajeev Bagga D Pranav Chopra Answer: Option [A]
7 Who was the first Indian badminton player to hold number one rank in World rankings? A Manu Attri B Chetan Anand C Prakash Padukone D None of these Answer: Option [C]
8 Who is the first Indian badminton player to won the Gold Medal at the Commonwealth Games in Australia? A Syed Modi B Prakash Padukone C Pullela Gopichand D Ajay Jayaram Answer: Option [A]
9 Who won the All England Open Championship in 2001? A Gurusai Dutt B Pullela Gopichand C Prakash Padukone D Kidambi Srikanth Answer: Option [B]

10 The female badminton player became the youngest Padma Shri awardee in 2015. Who is she? A PV Sindhu B Jwala Gutta C Saina Nehwal D None of these Answer: Option [A] PV Sindhu became the youngest Padma Shri awardee at the age of 19 years.
